member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication
member.summary: The basic EFL component-based application class.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Type,System.String})
member.param: The component type information. The key should be a class type of BaseComponent subclass. The value should be a component id which is declared in tizen-manifest.xml.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication.OnInit(System.String[])
member.summary: This method will be called before running main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication.OnFinished
member.summary: This method will be called after exiting main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication.OnRun
member.summary: This method will be called to start main-loop

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLComponentBasedApplication.OnExit
member.summary: This method will be called to exit main-loop

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLWindowInfo.ResourceId
member.summary: Gets the resource ID of window

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.Default.EFLWindowInfo.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by this object. Can also dispose any other disposable objects.
member.param: If true, disposes any disposable objects. If false, does not dispose disposable objects.
